headline: Morgan Stanley Keeps Neutral Stance on Corning (GLW) Despite Optical Upside
summary: Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) is included among the 20 Best Performing Dividend Stocks in 2025. On December 16, Morgan Stanley analyst Meta Marshall raised the firm’s price target on Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) to $98 from $82 and kept an Equal Weight rating. Marshall said the AI trade broadened beyond semiconductor names in 2025, lifting infrastructure companies, […]
